rules.description: PC Style Open URL location - only in browsers (Control+L to Command+L)
PC Style Reopen Closed Tab - only in browsers (Control+Shift+T to Command+Shift+T)
PC Style New Private Window - only in browsers (Control+Shift+P/N to Command+Shift+P/N)
PC Style Lock Computer (Command+L to Control+Command+Q)
Paste without formatting Control+Shift+V to Command+Option+Shift+V
Press CAPS LOCK twice to activate, otherwise held down and use as HYPER (Control+Command+Shift+Option)
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut Control+Command+Shift+Option+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut Control+Command+Shift+Option+.
Enter is the same as Return (Keypad Enter to Return)
Workaround for opening emoji menu on non MacOS keyboard (Alt+Command to fn)
Finder: Move one folder back in Finder with Mouse Button 4
Finder: Move one folder forward in Finder with Mouse Button 5
RDM: Move one folder forward in Explorer with Mouse Button 5
RDM: Move one folder back in Explorer with Mouse Button 4
Yabai: toggle float and zoom (HYPER+T | HYPER+G/F)

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --warp north || (/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display north; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus north)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --warp west || (/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display west; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus west)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --warp south || (/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display south; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus south)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --warp east || (/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display east; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus east)

rules.description: Yabai: stack navigation | windows focus (HYPE+Tab | HYPER+E/Q)
Yabai: layout configuration stack|bsp|float (HYPER+C | HYPER+P | HYPER+N)

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m config layout bsp && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space 4 --layout float && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m rule --apply app='^(Firefox|Safari|Comet)$' space=1 && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m rule --apply app='^TradingView$' space=2 && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m rule --apply app='^(Discord|Proton Mail)$' space=4 && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m rule --apply app='WhatsApp$' space=4 && open -g 'rectangle-pro://execute-layout?name=left'
